spec_data.Name: perl-Locale-PO
spec_data.Description:
This module simplifies management of GNU gettext .po files and is an
alternative to using emacs po-mode. It provides an object-oriented
interface in which each entry in a .po file is a Locale::PO object.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 12:57:58 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Perl module for manipulating .po entries from GNU gettext
